divs: Sighting Detailsi slept soundly on the night of15oct night at about9 30 pm.i woke up to go to toilet for a pee,at that time i noticed through the window a pulsuating big bright crimson colour light moving lowly and slowly in straight direction from south east innerwest towards northwest going towards richmond.this kind of light i have never seen before in the sky,it was much bigger than the polar star say twice big and while pusuating it was three four times bigger,as i was inside the house with closed windows i could not hear any sound.i kept looking at it though i was feeling pressure to go to loo,i couldnt hold on and went when i came back it was still going slowly,at that time i checked the time it was 1 35 am approx it has taken full five minutes and i could still see it faintly at a distance and it looked faint orange colour.as my wife was sleeping soundly i didnot wake her up.in my life i have not seen this type of flying light,i am not sure what it was but it was not common and night time there are no low fying aircrafts.after this i kept sitting and looking out but nothing happened for about two hours and then i fell sleep.itried to report straight away on phone but somehow it got delayed and now i feel i must report it as its not normal what happened that light i can still remember how beautiful crimson colour it had and the way it was pulsuating,for me it was strange experience and i want to share it and if possible have it invetigated thanks
Summary: low slow moving crimson colour pulsuating light three times bigger than star
trends: There have been no other sightings in Blacktown
This sighting has never been favorited.
